channel.title: FractionRSPS Awesome Eco, Community, Great Combat System
channel.description:
FractionRSPS was created in October of 2013 by the 2 owners Mikk and Dany. The creation did take awhile since it was the first server the two of them have setup. The initial setup including the time for the beta server and testers to play took around 2 weeks before the server was online to the public. Since then Fraction has had nothing but a growing community. As of August 8, 2014 FractionRSPS has outdone itslef with releasing its own new source that reveals alot more to the community! This took about a month of work from the owners and admins to get it to where it is now. Everyday we are looking for a new challenge and hope to make an impact on all players that come through our sight! ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Why Join FractionRSPS?
FractionRSPS is a fast growing community that has its own balance of a community while working its way to one of the most enjoyable communites of RSPS.
While FractionRSPS offers a great PVP community with perfect switches, hybriding algorithm, and spec switches we are also a PVM community with one of the highest PVM based monsters out of RSPS Communities.
Fraction offers 35+ Bosses to fight between with an active community of 30-50 players on at a time to make your PVM and PVP experience perfect. ------------------------------------------------------------------------- What FractionRSPS has to offer
24/7 UpTime with Updates All Skills working 100% 35+ Bosses to kill with friends 6 PVP Zones 2 Donator Zones RuneSpan Working World Bosses Duel Arena Custom Items (Ex Black Phat) and more! All Donator+ Have Yell In Game Triva w/Shops 10 Prestiges Multiple Quests Fully Working Music Multiple Minigames Working Comp Cape Skill World Messages Working Emotes Spam Free Community Working DirectX Vote4Cash Auto Donate Active Forums Great Community Great Staff Server Security Community/PVM/PK/ECO Based Server VERY ACTIVE COMMUNITY BASED OWNERS! (Mikk and Dany)
Forums Link: http://fraction718.net63.net/forum/index.php Direct Client Download: http://www.upload.ee/files/4313544/Loader.jar.html
Daily Server Backups Full DDos Protection
Thanks for your time on reading this! Hope to see you in game.

item.title: FractionRSPS Awesome Eco, Community, Great Combat System
item.dc:creator: @mikkvsdany mikkvsdany
item.description:
@mikkvsdany wrote:

FractionRSPS was created in October of 2013 by the 2 owners Mikk and Dany. The creation did take awhile since it was the first server the two of them have setup. The initial setup including the time for the beta server and testers to play took around 2 weeks before the server was online to the public.
Since then Fraction has had nothing but a growing community.
As of August 8, 2014 FractionRSPS has outdone itslef with releasing its own new source that reveals alot more to the community! This took about a month of work from the owners and admins to get it to where it is now.
Everyday we are looking for a new challenge and hope to make an impact on all players that come through our sight!

Why Join FractionRSPS?

FractionRSPS is a fast growing community that has its own balance of a community while working its way to one of the most enjoyable communites of RSPS.

While FractionRSPS offers a great PVP community with perfect switches, hybriding algorithm, and spec switches we are also a PVM community with one of the highest PVM based monsters out of RSPS Communities.

Fraction offers 35+ Bosses to fight between with an active community of 30-50 players on at a time to make your PVM and PVP experience perfect.

What FractionRSPS has to offer

24/7 UpTime with Updates
All Skills working 100%
35+ Bosses to kill with friends
6 PVP Zones
2 Donator Zones
RuneSpan Working
World Bosses
Duel Arena
Custom Items (Ex Black Phat) and more!
All Donator+ Have Yell
In Game Triva w/Shops
10 Prestiges
Multiple Quests
Fully Working Music
Multiple Minigames
Working Comp Cape
Skill World Messages
Working Emotes
Spam Free Community
Working DirectX
Vote4Cash
Auto Donate
Active Forums
Great Community
Great Staff
Server Security
Community/PVM/PK/ECO Based Server
VERY ACTIVE COMMUNITY BASED OWNERS!
(Mikk and Dany)

Forums Link: http://fraction718.net63.net/forum/index.php
Direct Client Download: http://www.upload.ee/files/4313544/Loader.jar.html

Daily Server Backups
Full DDos Protection

Thanks for your time on reading this! Hope to see you in game.
